>>> from assignment import *
>>> gauss1d(0.3)
array([0.24935221, 0.24935221])
>>> gauss1d(0.5)
array([0.011109  , 0.60653066, 0.60653066, 0.011109  ])
>>> gauss1d(1)
array([0.00218749, 0.04393693, 0.32465247, 0.8824969 , 0.8824969 ,
       0.32465247, 0.04393693, 0.00218749])
>>> gauss1d(2)
array([0.00508607, 0.02279418, 0.07955951, 0.21626517, 0.45783336,
       0.7548396 , 0.96923323, 0.96923323, 0.7548396 , 0.45783336,
       0.21626517, 0.07955951, 0.02279418, 0.00508607])
